subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: With a 12-9 record in one-plus seasons, it will take much more time for Steve Spurrier to build a program at South Carolina that can challenge the elite of the Southeastern Conference.
snippet: With a 12-9 record in one-plus seasons, it will take much more time for Steve Spurrier to build a program at South Carolina that can challenge the elite of the Southeastern Conference.
